Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: CLI Incorrect message for send NODE (update node) with not existing dest
Issue.description: new key with seed 000000000000000000000000Steward1 sovrin@test> send NODE dest=8ECVSk179mjsjKRLWiQtssMLgp6EPhWXtaYyStWPSGAb data=\{'alias': 'Node2', 'services': } *Actual Results:* Error message contains incorrect information: "Node request failed with error: client request invalid: UnauthorizedClientRequest('FYmoFw55GeQH7SRFa37dkx1d2dZ3zUF8ckg7wmL7ofN4 is not a steward of node 8ECVSk179mjsjKRLWiQtssMLgp6EPhWXtaYyStWPSGAb',)" but stewards can't demote/promote nodes. *Expected Results:* Message should contain information that only TRUSTEE can demote/promote nodes. Â *Case 2:* *Steps to Reproduce:* 1. Open the CLI. 2. Try to demote node as Steward. sovrin@test> new key with seed 000000000000000000000000Steward1 sovrin@test> send NODE dest=8ECVSk179mjsjKRLWiQtssMLgp6EPhWXtaYyStWPSGAb data=\{'alias': 'Node2', 'services': 'VALIDATOR' } *Actual Results:* Error message contains incorrect information: "Node request failed with error: client request invalid: UnauthorizedClientRequest('FYmoFw55GeQH7SRFa37dkx1d2dZ3zUF8ckg7wmL7ofN4 is not a steward of node 8ECVSk179mjsjKRLWiQtssMLgp6EPhWXtaYyStWPSGAb',)" but stewards can't demote/promote nodes. *Expected Results:* Message should contain information that only TRUSTEE can demote/promote nodes. >
